name: Long Smile Prototype
description:
Long smile is based on the Japanese folklore Kuchisake-onna. 

In this game you have to protect your children from the Kuchisake-onna by throwing traditional Japanese rock candy at her to keep her at bay for the set time until help arrives and she disappears into the night.

Controls: WASD to move, Right Mouse Button to fire rock candy while standing still.

Early stages means I'm using free models for the moment until I can make the proper enemy model I was given only 4 weeks to make this project and I have done with it what I could. In saying that the UI elements are also very limited there is no pause button however once the 3 minute timer ends you will be able to either replay or quit the game with no troubles.

There is also currently no sound in the game what so ever, its very barebones at the moment, but I do hope you like the concept as I tried to build the correct atmosphere for it, thank you!
